headline: Why The Stabilus (XTRA:STM) Narrative Is Shifting After Target Cuts And New Guidance
summary: Stabilus is back in focus after its fair value estimate was cut from €33.09 to €30.43, an adjustment that mirrors a €7 reduction in JPMorgan’s own price target. That change is tied to updated valuation work that incorporates revised growth assumptions and execution risk, contributing to the new blended target of €30.43. As you read on, you will see how these moving targets shape the evolving Stabilus story and what to watch to keep up with it. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Stabilus...

headline: Crypto Loses Its Grip on Retail Army Now Defecting to Equities
summary: Now they’re moving on, stalling the demand engine that digital assets have depended on for a decade.  Speculative demand that once concentrated in crypto is being sucked into stocks, according to a new report from market-maker Wintermute that draws on JPMorgan Chase & Co. data.  Since late 2024, retail has been steadily shifting toward equities, a trend that accelerated sharply after the October crypto crash, according to the report.

headline: All the highlights from Berkshire CEO Abel's first shareholder letter
summary: After two months on the job, new Berkshire Hathaway CEO Greg Abel emphasizes he won't be making major changes to the way the company has operated for decades under Warren Buffett's leadership.

raw.headline: All the highlights from Berkshire CEO Abel's first shareholder letter
